text: Trump sends ‘wartime prime minister’ Netanyahu back to Israel with a boost - The Washington Post

text: New measles cases in South Carolina put U.S. on the verge of losing elimination status - NBC News

text: Flu cases are surging and rates will likely get worse, new CDC data shows - NPR
fullText: Flu season is off to a rough start this year, according to new CDC data. The virus is spreading faster than in previous years and the surge is likely to get worse. Here's what you need to know.

text: Disney to pay $10m over alleged children's privacy law violations - BBC

text: Judge orders Trump administration to continue to seek funding for the CFPB - NPR

text: Patriots star receiver Stefon Diggs faces strangulation and assault charges - NBC News
fullText: Star New England Patriots wide receiver Stefon Diggs, who recently welcomed a baby boy with girlfriend Cardi B, was accused of felony strangulation, court records revealed.

text: An escalation in Yemen threatens to reignite civil war and widen tensions in the Gulf - NPR
fullText: Saudi Arabia bombed Yemen's port city of Mukalla, targeting a shipment of weapons from the United Arab Emirates for separatist forces. The UAE later said it would withdraw its forces from Yemen.
